title: organizer.image.post
description: Describes the request body to add an image to an [organizer](./organizer.json).

id.description: The unique id (generated by UiTdatabank) of the image.

language.description:
The language of the image or description.
Can be one of `nl`, `fr`, `de`, or `en`.

copyrightHolder.description: The copyright holder of the image.

description.example: Picture of the last publiq event
description.description: Description of the image object, in the language used in the `language` property of the image object.
